code:
sequenceDiagram
  participant U as User/Annotator
  participant I as Ingestion
  participant T as Transliteration Pipeline
  participant E as Evaluation
  participant A as Artefact Store
  participant F as Fine-Tune
  participant L as Translation
  participant S as Speech Synth
  U->>I: Provide raw audio + notes
  I->>T: Dialogue objects
  T->>E: Candidate transliterations
  E->>U: Low-confidence samples (Infra_IngressController)
  U->>E: Feedback + corrections
  E->>A: Accepted artefacts (Infra_WorkerNode)
  A->>F: Aligned audio/text pairs
  F->>L: Improved transcriptions
  L->>S: Final translations
  S->>U: Synthesized speech
  U->>E: Validate synthesis (Infra_EtcdCluster)
repo_description: A repository that implements a service for understanding, writing and recreating dead or almost-dead languages
